ygData.subject: Re: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Color Flux is a *VERY* useful get out of jail free card.  It casts extremely fast and provides a 2 sec AE stun so that you have time to cast another
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
> >Color Shift is apparently a research only spell because I have been
> >unsuccessful in finding and am not really sure what the total
> effect is. I
> >*think* it's probably an improved version of Color Flux, but I'm
> not sure.
> >
>
> i _think_ i saw it on a vendor in the freeport magic guild. i never used
> color flux, is it a useful stun spell?
>

Color Flux is a *VERY* useful "get out of jail free" card. It casts
extremely fast and provides a 2 sec AE stun so that you have time to cast
another spell.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
